author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

LLVM Analyzer reports use-after-free in `VariableComputerTest::VariableComputerTest`, see e.g. [this](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/jenkins-artifacts/ib-static-analysis/CMSSW_14_2_X_2024-09-29-0000/el8_amd64_gcc12/llvm-analysis/report-8d81fe.html#EndPath). The warning looks false-positive. This change will (hopefully) silence it

#### PR validation:

Bot tests
title: [LLVM Analyzer] Silence (false-positive) use-after-free warning in VariableComputerTest::VariableComputerTest
